name: Balanced
description: Balanced rainfall mix with near-equal chances of low, normal, and high rainfall.

name: Drought Leaning
description: Higher chance of low rainfall to simulate drought-leaning seasons.

name: Flood Leaning
description: Higher chance of high rainfall to model flood-leaning seasons.

name: Normal Rainfall Baseline
description: Mostly normal rainfall with modest low and high tails.

name: Randomized Mix
description: Randomized mix generated from the seed (or randomly when no seed is provided).
